#################################################

How to install:
1. Run Blasterball 2 Holidays_setup.exe

#################################################

About the game:

Break the monotony in your day and salute every major holiday of the year with this exciting new version of Blasterball 2. Chisel away at bricks and break into 200 all-new levels! You'll be whisked through layers of mesmerizing patterns and 3D graphics. From shamrocks on St. Patrick's Day to falling snowflakes in the winter, this edition provides seasonal bliss for every occasion. Let the stress fall away as you sit back and enjoy this colorful game full of dynamic visuals and music that soothes.
